column5: Anyone ever stay here? thanks for any comments.
Apparently no one to live and tell about it.
Stayed there twice within the last two years. It's adequate at best.Only saving grace is you can back your vehicle up in front of your room.Best motel by far in Chapleau is the Aux Trois Moulins.
Thanks to all. PM back to Pete.

Stayed there a few nights a couple winters ago. The price was right but you get what you pay for. People were nice, beds were tiny, rooms straight from the 60's. They were moving snow with a payloader all night long, noooo sleep. Could have changed since then but I'd look around.
